{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "GIS Data Analyst",
  "description": "Polaris Digitech Limited is a location intelligence firm that specializes in providing data, software and decision support services to fulfill its client&rsquo;s strategies and management needs through the development and deployment of Geographic Information Systems (GIS).

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: GIS Data Analyst
Job Location:&nbsp;Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a motivated and detail-oriented GIS Data Analyst with expertise in Geographic Information Systems (GIS) and Python programming. The successful candidate will be responsible for collecting, analyzing, and interpreting spatial and non-spatial data to support decision-making processes.


Key Responsibilities


	Collect, clean, and analyze spatial and non-spatial datasets from multiple sources.
	Utilize GIS software (e.g. ArcGIS, QGIS) to perform spatial analysis and create maps and visualizations.
	Develop and maintain Python scripts to automate data processing and analysis tasks.
	Interpret and present data insights through reports, dashboards, and presentations.
	Collaborate with cross-functional teams to support data-driven decision-making.
	Ensure data accuracy, integrity, and consistency across various datasets.
	Conduct geospatial modeling and statistical analysis to address complex problems.
	Identify trends, patterns, and anomalies within datasets and provide actionable insights.
	Document processes and methodologies for reproducibility and knowledge sharing.


Required Skills and Qualifications


	Bachelor&#39;s degree in Geography, Geology, Data Science, Computer Science, or a related field.
	2-3 years of experience in data analysis with a focus on GIS and Python programming.
	Proficiency in GIS tools (e.g., ArcGIS, QGIS) and geospatial data processing.
	Strong Python programming skills for data manipulation, automation, and analysis (e.g., Pandas, NumPy, GeoPandas).
	Experience working with spatial databases (e.g., PostGIS, SQLite) and SQL queries. Have practical knowledge of database management.
	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with attention to detail.
	Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.


Preferred Skills:


	Knowledge of remote sensing techniques and satellite imagery analysis.
	Familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g Google Cloud) for data storage and processing.
	Experience with web mapping technologies (e.g., Leaflet, Mapbox)
	Understand statistical and machine-learning techniques for geospatial data.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;careers@polarisdigitech.net&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

  "validThrough": "2026-03-01",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Polaris Digitech Limited"
    
  },

    "@type": "Place",

      "addressLocality": "Lagos",
      "addressCountry": "NG"
     
      
    }
  },

    "value": "193934"
  },

    "@type": "MonetaryAmount",

    "value": {
      "@type": "QuantitativeValue",
      "minValue": 0,
      "maxValue": 0,

    }

}



GIS Data Analyst Job at Polaris Digitech Limited




        
    

        
        Polaris Digitech Limited is a location intelligence firm that specializes in providing data, software and decision support services to fulfill its client’s strategies and management needs through the development and deployment of Geographic Information Systems (GIS).

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: GIS Data Analyst
Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are seeking a motivated and detail-oriented GIS Data Analyst with expertise in Geographic Information Systems (GIS) and Python programming. The successful candidate will be responsible for collecting, analyzing, and interpreting spatial and non-spatial data to support decision-making processes.


Key Responsibilities


	Collect, clean, and analyze spatial and non-spatial datasets from multiple sources.
	Utilize GIS software (e.g. ArcGIS, QGIS) to perform spatial analysis and create maps and visualizations.
	Develop and maintain Python scripts to automate data processing and analysis tasks.
	Interpret and present data insights through reports, dashboards, and presentations.
	Collaborate with cross-functional teams to support data-driven decision-making.
	Ensure data accuracy, integrity, and consistency across various datasets.
	Conduct geospatial modeling and statistical analysis to address complex problems.
	Identify trends, patterns, and anomalies within datasets and provide actionable insights.
	Document processes and methodologies for reproducibility and knowledge sharing.


Required Skills and Qualifications


	Bachelor's degree in Geography, Geology, Data Science, Computer Science, or a related field.
	2-3 years of experience in data analysis with a focus on GIS and Python programming.
	Proficiency in GIS tools (e.g., ArcGIS, QGIS) and geospatial data processing.
	Strong Python programming skills for data manipulation, automation, and analysis (e.g., Pandas, NumPy, GeoPandas).
	Experience working with spatial databases (e.g., PostGIS, SQLite) and SQL queries. Have practical knowledge of database management.
	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with attention to detail.
	Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.


Preferred Skills:


	Knowledge of remote sensing techniques and satellite imagery analysis.
	Familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g Google Cloud) for data storage and processing.
	Experience with web mapping technologies (e.g., Leaflet, Mapbox)
	Understand statistical and machine-learning techniques for geospatial data.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@polarisdigitech.net using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Senior Developer",
  "description": "E-Doc is a fintech AI company utilising technology-driven compliance focused on simplifying regulatory processes and expanding access to finance across emerging markets. Our platform is built on an Open Banking framework, to supports use cases such as automated bank statement retrieval, creditworthiness analysis, regulatory reporting, and digital application workflows.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Senior Developer
Job Location:&nbsp;Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are seeking a highly skilled Senior Developer with experience in banking and fintech environments to join our technology team.
	The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience in building APIs, digital wallets, instant payment systems, and Banking-as-a-Service platforms, and a strong understanding of financial regulations and compliance requirements.
	You will play a key role indesigning, developing, and maintaining scalable financial applications, enabling seamless integration between banks, fintechs, and end-users.


Key Responsibilities


	Design, develop, and maintain API-driven financial applicationsincluding wallets, instant payments, and BaaS platforms.
	Buildsecure, scalable, and high-performance backend systemsfor banking and fintech services.
	Integrate with core banking systems, payment gateways, and third-party fintech services.
	Collaborate with product, compliance, and operations teamsto ensure solutions meet regulatory and business requirements.
	Ensure high availability, data integrity, and security of financial services platforms.
	Participate in the full software development lifecycle: requirements gathering, architecture design, coding, testing, deployment, and maintenance.
	Write clean, maintainable codeand performpeer code reviews.
	Contribute to technical documentation, API specifications, and developer guides.
	Stay current with emerging technologies, industry standards, and regulatory changes affecting fintech and banking applications.


Required Qualifications &amp; Experience


	Bachelor&rsquo;s or Master&rsquo;s Degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field.
	5+ years of professional software development experience, preferably inbanking or fintech environments.
	Strong experience with restful APIs, microservices architecture, and cloud-native applications.
	Hands-on experience with digital wallets, instant payments, and Banking-as-a-Service platforms.
	Proficiency in programming languagessuch asJava, C#, Python, Node.js, or Go.
	Experience with relational and NoSQL databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, Redis, etc.).
	Familiarity with security standards(PCI-DSS, ISO 27001) andregulatory compliancein financial services.
	Knowledge of payment systems, ACH, RTGS, card processing, and open banking APIs.
	Experience with DevOps tools and CI/CD pipelines.
	Excellent problem-solving, analytical, and communication skills.


Preferred / Plus:


	Experience working withcentral banks, regulatory frameworks, or fintech sandbox environments.
	Exposure toblockchain, digital currencies, or mobile money ecosystems.
	Understanding ofKnow Your Customer (KYC), Anti-Money Laundering (AML), and data privacy laws.
	Prior experience withfintech partnerships, API monetization, or BaaS commercialization.


Competencies:


	Strongtechnical leadership and mentoringskills.
	Ability totranslate business requirements into technical solutions.
	Comfortable working infast-paced, agile environments.
	High level ofattention to detailand commitment tosecurity and compliance.


Why Join Us


	Work at the forefront of digital banking innovation.
	Opportunity to build next-generation fintech and BaaS solutions.
	Exposure to cross-functional teams, regulatory bodies, and industry-leading fintechs.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;Hr@e-doconline.co.uk&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

  "validThrough": "2026-03-04",

Senior Developer Job at E-Doc




        
    

        
        E-Doc is a fintech AI company utilising technology-driven compliance focused on simplifying regulatory processes and expanding access to finance across emerging markets. Our platform is built on an Open Banking framework, to supports use cases such as automated bank statement retrieval, creditworthiness analysis, regulatory reporting, and digital application workflows.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Senior Developer
Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

            
    




	We are seeking a highly skilled Senior Developer with experience in banking and fintech environments to join our technology team.
	The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience in building APIs, digital wallets, instant payment systems, and Banking-as-a-Service platforms, and a strong understanding of financial regulations and compliance requirements.
	You will play a key role indesigning, developing, and maintaining scalable financial applications, enabling seamless integration between banks, fintechs, and end-users.


Key Responsibilities


	Design, develop, and maintain API-driven financial applicationsincluding wallets, instant payments, and BaaS platforms.
	Buildsecure, scalable, and high-performance backend systemsfor banking and fintech services.
	Integrate with core banking systems, payment gateways, and third-party fintech services.
	Collaborate with product, compliance, and operations teamsto ensure solutions meet regulatory and business requirements.
	Ensure high availability, data integrity, and security of financial services platforms.
	Participate in the full software development lifecycle: requirements gathering, architecture design, coding, testing, deployment, and maintenance.
	Write clean, maintainable codeand performpeer code reviews.
	Contribute to technical documentation, API specifications, and developer guides.
	Stay current with emerging technologies, industry standards, and regulatory changes affecting fintech and banking applications.


Required Qualifications & Experience


	Bachelor’s or Master’s Degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field.
	5+ years of professional software development experience, preferably inbanking or fintech environments.
	Strong experience with restful APIs, microservices architecture, and cloud-native applications.
	Hands-on experience with digital wallets, instant payments, and Banking-as-a-Service platforms.
	Proficiency in programming languagessuch asJava, C#, Python, Node.js, or Go.
	Experience with relational and NoSQL databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, Redis, etc.).
	Familiarity with security standards(PCI-DSS, ISO 27001) andregulatory compliancein financial services.
	Knowledge of payment systems, ACH, RTGS, card processing, and open banking APIs.
	Experience with DevOps tools and CI/CD pipelines.
	Excellent problem-solving, analytical, and communication skills.


Preferred / Plus:


	Experience working withcentral banks, regulatory frameworks, or fintech sandbox environments.
	Exposure toblockchain, digital currencies, or mobile money ecosystems.
	Understanding ofKnow Your Customer (KYC), Anti-Money Laundering (AML), and data privacy laws.
	Prior experience withfintech partnerships, API monetization, or BaaS commercialization.


Competencies:


	Strongtechnical leadership and mentoringskills.
	Ability totranslate business requirements into technical solutions.
	Comfortable working infast-paced, agile environments.
	High level ofattention to detailand commitment tosecurity and compliance.


Why Join Us


	Work at the forefront of digital banking innovation.
	Opportunity to build next-generation fintech and BaaS solutions.
	Exposure to cross-functional teams, regulatory bodies, and industry-leading fintechs.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: Hr@e-doconline.co.uk using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Project Management Officer (PMO)",
  "description": "Polaris Digitech Limited is a location intelligence firm that specializes in providing data, software and decision support services to fulfill its client&rsquo;s strategies and management needs through the development and deployment of Geographic Information Systems (GIS).

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Project Management Officer (PMO)

Job Location:&nbsp;Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Reports To: Project Manager

Job Summary


	We are seeking a highly skilled and tech-savvy Project Management Officer with experience in managing projects that are IT related.
	The ideal candidate will work with the Project Manager to oversee field work and follow-up with projects using project tools effective for tracking project development.


Responsibilities


	Participate in the contract review process and assist in thetranslation of the agreed
	Terms and Conditions into project deliverables.
	Effectively communicate the delegated project goals and objectives as defined by the Project Manager.
	Identify risks to projects and maintain a risk register.
	Support the development of mitigation plans, their implementation and monitoring.
	Support the Project Manager, Project Accountant and Administrative Manager in the preparation of the project status reports and internal/customer progress reports.
	Support the Project Manager, Administrative and Finance Managers regarding Purchase order maintenance, particularly regarding variation, order tracking and management ofchange.
	Comply with the company and/or project specific procedures for reporting progress andissues to satisfy customer and company requirements.
	Develop and manage project plans and reports. Participate in budget preparation foreach project working with Project Manager, Administrative Manager and Finance Manager.
	Manage and facilitate flow of essential information among company team members.
	Maintain project calendar and milestones.
	Implement and administer quantitative staffing models developed by the managementto describe staffing resource levels for projects, given their specific executionrequirements.


Qualifications and Skills


	BSc / HND in a Business Admin, Computer Science, Geography or industry related discipline.
	Maximum of 2+ years of previous experience post qualification at Project Management.
	Exposure to IT solution projects in a multi-disciplinary environment.
	Sound knowledge of project management processes and the ability to deployapplications live.
	Conversant with project management metrics and evaluation.
	Good knowledge of commercial and financial processes on projects.
	Membership /Affiliate of Project Management body is an advantage or certifcation.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;careers@polarisdigitech.net&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

Project Management Officer (PMO) Job at Polaris Digitech Limited




        
    

        
        Polaris Digitech Limited is a location intelligence firm that specializes in providing data, software and decision support services to fulfill its client’s strategies and management needs through the development and deployment of Geographic Information Systems (GIS).

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Project Management Officer (PMO)

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Reports To: Project Manager

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are seeking a highly skilled and tech-savvy Project Management Officer with experience in managing projects that are IT related.
	The ideal candidate will work with the Project Manager to oversee field work and follow-up with projects using project tools effective for tracking project development.


Responsibilities


	Participate in the contract review process and assist in thetranslation of the agreed
	Terms and Conditions into project deliverables.
	Effectively communicate the delegated project goals and objectives as defined by the Project Manager.
	Identify risks to projects and maintain a risk register.
	Support the development of mitigation plans, their implementation and monitoring.
	Support the Project Manager, Project Accountant and Administrative Manager in the preparation of the project status reports and internal/customer progress reports.
	Support the Project Manager, Administrative and Finance Managers regarding Purchase order maintenance, particularly regarding variation, order tracking and management ofchange.
	Comply with the company and/or project specific procedures for reporting progress andissues to satisfy customer and company requirements.
	Develop and manage project plans and reports. Participate in budget preparation foreach project working with Project Manager, Administrative Manager and Finance Manager.
	Manage and facilitate flow of essential information among company team members.
	Maintain project calendar and milestones.
	Implement and administer quantitative staffing models developed by the managementto describe staffing resource levels for projects, given their specific executionrequirements.


Qualifications and Skills


	BSc / HND in a Business Admin, Computer Science, Geography or industry related discipline.
	Maximum of 2+ years of previous experience post qualification at Project Management.
	Exposure to IT solution projects in a multi-disciplinary environment.
	Sound knowledge of project management processes and the ability to deployapplications live.
	Conversant with project management metrics and evaluation.
	Good knowledge of commercial and financial processes on projects.
	Membership /Affiliate of Project Management body is an advantage or certifcation.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@polarisdigitech.net using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

	API documentation.
